name: Password-Generator
tooltipText: A Javascript Password Generator that allows the user to select the criteria for the password.

name: Sports Quiz
tooltipText: A Sports Quiz with some personal favorite sports questions. Don't get any wrong or your time will be deducted! Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Note Taker
tooltipText: A Note Taker app. I was given a Frontend and I was given the task of creating routes to query mongoose with POST and GET requests.

name: Employee Directory
tooltipText: This is a directory using React.js all made from scracth. It calls a random user API and allows you to search for a person by their first name or you can sort by names.
